Codename

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • Codename.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Organize the music by author, album and track, read music's metadata and insert it into a database. External libraries used here: Beablebuddy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Library() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createMp3Folder(java.io.File mp3)
      Reads MP3's artist and album, and creates a path following the model /artist/album/.
      java.lang.String extension(java.lang.String file)
      Returns the extension of a file (3 last chars)
      java.lang.String getMp3Album(java.io.File mp3)
      Returns the MP3 album data using Beaglebuddy
      java.lang.String getMp3Artist(java.io.File mp3)
      Return the MP3 artist data using Beaglebuddy
      void moveMp3(java.io.File mp3)
      Read mp3 artist and album and moves it to the path music_folder/artist/album.
      java.lang.String music_path()
      Returns the default music folder path (C:\%Username%\Música for Windows y /home/user/Música for Linux)
      void noData(java.io.File noData)
      Moves a file into a default folder if there is no metadata or isn't a Mp3

      This is the second main method.

      This is the first main method.

      Read MP3 metadata and insert it into the database

      • readDir

        public void readDir(java.io.File dir)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This is the first main method. Open the param directory and read it, looking for MP3 files. If there is a subdirectory inside, recursively read it. If a MP3 is found, calls ReadMp3().
        Parameters:
        dir -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • organizeDir

        public void organizeDir(java.io.File dir)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This is the second main method. Open the param directory and read it looking for MP3 files. If there is a subdirectory inside, recursively read it. If there is a MP3 file inside, read the metadata. If null, calls noData(). If not null, calls createMp3Folder() and moveMp3(). If there is a non-MP3 file inside, calls noData().
        Parameters:
        dir -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createMp3Folder

        public void createMp3Folder(java.io.File mp3)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Reads MP3's artist and album, and creates a path following the model /artist/album/. ONLY IF FOLDER DOESN'T EXISTS.
        Parameters:
        mp3 -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • moveMp3

        public void moveMp3(java.io.File mp3)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Read mp3 artist and album and moves it to the path music_folder/artist/album.
        Parameters:
        mp3 -
        Throws:
